subject: Concussions
Medicine and Health
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Washington now has what advocates say is the nation’s toughest law regulating when high school athletes can return to games after having sustained a concussion. The law prohibits athletes under 18 suspected of sustaining a concussion from returning to play without a licensed health care provider’s approval.
